pacs 0.3.3

Retrieving all Bioconductor releases

Source: R/check.R
bio_releases.Rd

Retrieving all Bioconductor releases. The data is downloaded from https://www.bioconductor.org/about/release-announcements/.

bio_releases()

Value

data.frame with the same structure as the html table on https://www.bioconductor.org/about/release-announcements/.

Note

Results are cached for 1 hour with memoise package.

Examples

bio_releases()
#>    Release       Date Software packages    R
#> 1     3.13 2020-05-20              2042  4.1
#> 2     3.12 2020-10-28              1974  4.0
#> 3     3.11 2020-04-28              1903  4.0
#> 4     3.10 2020-10-30              1823  3.6
#> 5      3.9 2020-05-03              1741  3.6

#> 8      3.6 2020-10-31              1473  3.4
